tha-ap469:0.3_0: Remember the Feet of the Ascetic Life,
tha-ap469:1.4_0: while walking along I glanced at her.
tha-ap469:10.1_0: eat fruit of the senior monks.
tha-ap469:3.1_0: “Because I’ve reached the stage of life,
tha-ap469:3.2_0: welfare and happiness in this life,
tha-ap469:3.3_0: Having given the fruit of the Buddha,
tha-ap469:3.4_0: with a clear and confident heart.
tha-ap469:4.3_0: all the precious things that rise.
tha-ap469:5.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap469:5.4_0: and the fruit of good and results.
tha-ap469:6.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
tha-ap469:8.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap469:9.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bāhuka.
